<Before Eval>
this._times = this._times || 0;
this._times += 1;
user._agatktimes = user._agatktimes || 0;
if(user.isStateAffected(298) && 
   user._agatktimes > 0 &&
   this._times == 1){
   user._agatktimes -= 1;
   if(user._agatktimes == 0){
    user.removeState(298);
   }
  }
</Before Eval>

<damage formula>
  value = 60+3/2*user.level+3/5*user.atk;
  if(user.isStateAffected(298)){
    value += (user.isLearnedSkill(222)?140: 0);
    value += (user.isLearnedSkill(221)?120: 0);
    value += (user.isLearnedSkill(220)?100: 0);
    value += (user.isLearnedSkill(219)?80: 0);
    value += (user.isLearnedSkill(218)?60: 0);
  }
 value = Math.floor(value);
</damage formula>


<Post-Damage Eval>
 if(user.isStateAffected(292)){
    var random = Math.round(Math.random() * 10 + 1);
    if(random <= 3){
     user.addState(281);
    }
 }
</Post-Damage  Eval>

 target._block = target._block || 0;
 target._block -= 15;
 target._block = Math.max(target._block, -100);
 target._block = Math.min(target._block, 100);
 if(target._block == 0){ 
   target.setStateCounter(237, 0);
   target.setStateCounter(238, 0);

      target.addState(238);
      target.setStateCounter(238, target._block);
    }
    else{
      target.addState(237);
      target.setStateCounter(237, Math.abs(target._block));
    }
   }
</Pre-Damage Eval>
